entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023
